Package cdx.opencdx.communications.repository

Interface OpenCDXNotificaitonRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OpenCDXNotificationModel>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>
@Repository public interface OpenCDXNotificaitonRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<OpenCDXNotificationModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>
MongoRepository for the notificaitons collection.
